TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Floater extends System.Windows.Documents.AnchoredBlock
.class public auto ansi Floater extends System.Windows.Documents.AnchoredBlock

summary.span: 提供一个内联级别的流内容元素，该元素用于承载一个浮标。

span.span: Provides an inline-level flow content element used to host a floater.

summary.span: “浮标”显示与 中的主内容流平行的图像和其他内容\*\*。

span.span: A *floater* displays images and other content parallel to the main content flow in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或 元素通常用于突出显示或强调设计部分内容，以承载主内容流中的支持图像或其他内容，或插入松散相关的内容（如播发）。 or elements are often used to highlight or accentuate portions of content, to host supporting images or other content within the main content flow, or to inject loosely related content such as advertisements. 浮标可以包含从 Block 类继承的对象。A floater can contain objects that inherit from the Block class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [TextElement 内容模型概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview)For more information, see [TextElement Content Model Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview) 和 在不同方案中的使用方式不同。 and differ in several ways and are used for different scenarios. **算****Figure:** - 可定位：可设置其水平和垂直定位点，以便相对于页面、内容、栏或段落进行停靠。Can be positioned: You can set its horizontal and vertical anchors to dock it relative to the page, content, column or paragraph. 你还可以使用其 和 属性来指定任意偏移量。You can also use its and properties to specify arbitrary offsets. - 可调整到多个列：可将 高度和宽度设置为页面、内容或列的高度或宽度的倍数。Is sizable to more than one column: You can set height and width to multiples of page, content or column height or width. 请注意，对于页面和内容，倍数不能大于 1。Note that in the case of page and content, multiples greater than 1 are not allowed. 例如，可以将的宽度设置为 "0.5 页" 或 "0.25 content" 或 "2 列"。For example, you can set the width of a to be "0.5 page" or "0.25 content" or "2 Column". 还可将高度和宽度设置为绝对像素值。You can also set height and width to absolute pixel values. - 不分页：如果中的内容 无法放入 ，它将呈现合适的内容，并丢失剩余内容Does not paginate: If the content inside a does not fit inside the , it will render whatever content does fit and the remaining content is lost **Floater：****Floater:** - 无法定位，可在能够为其提供空间的任何位置呈现。Cannot be positioned and will render wherever space can be made available for it. 不能设置偏移或定位 。You cannot set the offset or anchor a . - 不能调整为多列：默认情况下， 在一列的大小。Cannot be sized to more than one column: By default, sizes at one column. 它有一个 可设置为绝对像素值的属性，但如果此值大于一个列宽，则将忽略该属性，并将浮标调整到一列。It has a property that can be set to an absolute pixel value, but if this value is greater than one column width it is ignored and the floater is sized at one column. 您可以通过设置正确的像素宽度来将其大小调整为小于一列，但调整大小不是列相对的，因此 "0.5 列" 不是宽度的有效表达式 。You can size it to less than one column by setting the correct pixel width, but sizing is not column-relative, so "0.5Column" is not a valid expression for width. 没有高度属性，且无法设置其高度，其高度取决于内容 has no height property and it's height cannot be set, it's height depends on the content - 分页：如果其指定宽度的内容超出了1列高度，则浮标会断开并分页到下一列、下一页等。 paginates: If its content at its specified width extends to more than 1 column height, floater breaks and paginates to the next column, the next page, etc. 是一个很好的位置，可将独立内容置于要控制其大小和位置的位置，并确信内容符合指定的大小。 is a good place to put standalone content where you want to control the size and positioning, and are confident that the content will fit in the specified size. 是放置更多自由流动内容的好位置，该内容与主页内容相似，但与主页内容分离。 is a good place to put more free-flowing content that flows similar to the main page content, but is separated from it. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个 包含 和元素的 。The following example defines a that contains both and elements. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FloaterFigureXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_floaterfigurexaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following illustration shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照：FlowDocument 中的 Floater 和图](~/add/media/floaterfigure.png "屏幕快照：FlowDocument 中的 Floater 和图")![Screenshot: Floaters and Figures in a FlowDocument](~/add/media/floaterfigure.png "Screenshot: Floaters and Figures in a FlowDocument")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 对象的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the width of a object.

value.span: 的宽度，以设备独立像素为单位。

span.span: The width of the , in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值 (等效于 自动) 的属性值，该值指示自动确定行高。

span.span: The default value is (equivalent to an attribute value of Auto), which indicates that the line height is determined automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 大于 或等于0.0 但小于的值的字符串表示形式 。A string representation of a value equal to or greater than 0.0 but smaller than . 不合格的值以为单位 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 。An unqualified value is measured in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* `double`如下所述的值， (（ `Auto`) ，后面是以下单位说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 、） `pt` 。A `double` value as described above, (except `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 自动Auto 使宽度自动确定。Causes the width to be determined automatically. 等效于的属性值 。Equivalent to a property value of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FloaterPropsXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_floaterpropsxaml)] [!code-csharp[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FloaterProps](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_floaterprops)] [!code-vb[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FloaterProps](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_floaterprops)]
